JobFullDesc:
AssociateMS Wealth Management (MSWM) Technology:
Morgan Stanley Wealth Management (MSWM) Technology is the global technology department responsible for the design, development, delivery and support of the technical solutions behind the products and services used by the Morgan Stanley Wealth Management (MSWM) business. The department is comprised of 10 organizations: Sales, Banking & Corporate-Client Technology, Investment Products & Markets Technology, Client Reporting, Core Processing, Private and International Wealth Management Technology, Technology Integration Office, Enterprise Infrastructure & Production Management, Capital Markets Application & Data Services, Deployment Planning & Release Management, and the Chief Operating Office. 
Technology Delivery Management Profile:
The Technology Delivery Management team is responsible for program management, project management and leading execution for various initiatives within MSWM. The team leads critical management efforts related to the complete lifecycle of the programs and projects. The team is well structured with right mapping of projects teams supporting multiple PAGs. The team closely interacts with the business to work on project plans, determine the scope, secure the related funding, and work closely with the development teams to execute and deliver  projects. The team is also responsible for efficiently managing the project (both through Waterfall, Agile methodologies) and also carries out cross-team networking and interactions to remove impediments. 
Position Description:
We are seeking an experienced Scrum Master to support multiple projects and initiatives in the Field Management Technology space in Wealth Management Technology. As part of this role, the candidate is expected to have strong Scrum Master Skills and work closely with all the critical stakeholders to successfully steer towards successful project outcomes. The candidate will work with core development teams, other support teams, and drive efficient planning and execution of initiatives. This position offers an interesting mix of business and technical aspects. Strong interpersonal skills and team spirit are required in addition to the ability to proficiently deliver verbal and written communications. This is a team that works extensively with other IT members in all MSWM locations. This job demands strong work ethic and requires extensive hands-on, active participation. In addition to our team in New York, the candidate will also work with our teams based out of Mumbai. Candidate will be working on Firm priority programs and Business Reporting Applications and be responsible for program delivery, execution and support. Candidate should be able to work in a dynamic environment with limited or no supervision. Should be comfortable managing time working with global team on multiple initiatives. 
Required Qualifications/Skills:
The ideal candidate for this position will have at least 8 years of program and project management experience with an ability to think tactically as well as strategically while coordinating cross functional teams in a maturing Agile Environment 

Experience in working on Technology projects related to Financial Services domain
Prior experience on a scrum team and ability to work with and lead a team
Demonstrated capabilities in successfully leading enterprise wide programs and projects. 
High degree of business acumen and technical competency; ability to balance and bridge technology and business needs; project and program management 
Management of core functions including business requirements elaboration, systems and process flow analysis, meeting critical milestones and deliverables that are time and scope bound. 
Demonstrated ability to manage multiple initiatives simultaneously and to resolve scheduling and other conflicts in order to meet all deadlines
Experience in working with agile lifecycle and/or tracking and process management tools, e.g. JIRA 
Deep skills in program management tools, including Microsoft Project, Access, Word, Excel, Visio, and SharePoint. 
Hands on project management approach that includes a proven track record of project/program execution 
Self-motivated with exceptional oral and written communication skills, ability to communicate clearly and concisely 
Ability to analyze and think quickly and to resolve conflict
Experience with successful Agile techniques
Ability to adapt to a changing environment
Self-motivated and ability to stay focused in the middle of distractions
